values: Light is a form of energy or brightness that makes it possible to see something.
I will turn on the light so that you can see.
n.灯光；灯
灯
n. 光，光线，光亮光源，电灯火焰，火花，点火物
vt. & vi. 点火，生火，点燃(使)容光焕发
vt. 照亮，照明
adj. 光线充足的，明亮的淡色的，浅色的轻的，不重的轻柔的；轻巧的易消化的，清淡的
时态:lighted，litlighting，lights

Light refers to the electromagnetic radiation that enables us to see objects.
